servicios.parrafo_uno: Specialized software consultants and systematization of business processes through scalable, sustainable, intuitive and tailored software (Android, IOS, Oracle, Java, Angular, JavaScript, HTML5).
servicios.parrafo_dos: Aimed at micro and small enterprises in any area (human resources, finance, commercial, operation, logistics, etc.) that need:
especialidades: Migrate your internal system to a more modern one or another new platform.
Innovate your business with custom software.
Quantitatively centralize the performance of your company.
Manage any type of information of your company with software.

proceso.descripcion: We work with a personal process copy of agile methodologies such as SCRUM and CASCADA

primero.descripcion: We schedule a meeting to listen to your request and its processes, answer questions and land software scopes.

segundo.descripcion: According to the analysis, a proposal is delivered in pdf format with the solution (s).

tercero.descripcion: Once the proposal has been approved by the client, a detailed contract with solution, scope, time and costs is generated.

quinto.descripcion: Solution is delivered to customer for approval.

nosotros.parrafo_uno: Group of professionals with more than 7 years of experience in the field of software development, collaborating with important companies such as Santander, Telcel, BlackBerry, Everis, Grupo Salinas, Devarana, Eglobal.
nosotros.parrafo_dos: We work fullstack projects as a freelancer, we seek to help micro businesses and macro businesses get better returns with the use of current technology tools with, add us.

ricardo.experiencia: 29 años de edad y 7 de experiencia.
